title: Ticket #5533: Conditionalize unit_test_sinful's protocol-specific tests.
description:
unit_test_sinful presently disables its IPv6 and mixed-mode tests on Windows because (a) #5532 isn't fixed yet and (b) it doesn't make sense to run the tests without IPv6. Also, (c), #5534 (no IPv6 addresses detected on Windows).

This should be changed so that the IPv4 / IPv6 / mixed-mode tests depend on an IPv4 / IPv6 / both address existing, and not on the peculiarities of the BaTLab's networking infrastructure and Windows configuration(s). Ideally, we would have HasIPv4, HasIP6 to the list of "test capabilities" we already have and make that information available to tests (because unit_test_sinful should still run even if the machine only has one protocol).
